turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello assistant I need to order a few pizzas for a party.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that Jet's pizza has a special, I have a coupon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have the coupon code?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it's Pizza16.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. Ok what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need 3 large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pizza 1 should have pepperoni on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pizza 2 should have chicken and BBQ.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like they're out of that one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh no. Ok. Let's do canadian bacon on that one then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the last one, it should be spinach and artichoke.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good. I'll put it on your card and email you the receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready for pickup in half an hour.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. It's the one on green?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's the one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
